players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Looks like Bob was targeted last night. We need to figure this out together, but I think staying quiet like Charlie isn't helping anyone."
Diana: "Charlie, any thoughts on why you stayed silent?"
Diana: "Charlie, your silence is suspicious. Can you explain why you haven't contributed to the discussion?"
You: "Charlie, your silence is making things difficult for all of us. Can you share anything that might help us figure out who the mafia is?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.

Diana: "Charlie, your silence is suspicious. Can you explain why you haven't contributed to the discussion?"
Alice: "Charlie, your silence is making things difficult for all of us. Can you share anything that might help us figure out who the mafia is?"
